description:
Suzu cannot accept Shoko getting away with murdering Seishun, and decides to revenge him.  Yoko also finds out about Shoko’s evil behavior from Enho.  Shokei goes to Kei and hears people complain about new Kei-o and unimproved living conditions in the kingdom, but also hears that Wa State’s Shi-Sui will give refugees a piece of land and citizenship.  Suzu finds out that Shoko is protected by a person in a higher place, and decides to revenge Seishun on Shoko and Kei-o.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Great Distance in The Wind, The Sky at Dawn - Chapter 9
Kaze no Banri, Reimei no Sora - Kyuu Shou
Путь по ветру, Небо на рассвете. Часть 9
風の万里 黎明の空 九章
